articles.title: Anthony Hopkins gives thanks for 45 years of sobriety in uplifting Twitter video - CNN
articles.description: Oscar-winning actor Anthony Hopkins has posted a video on Twitter celebrating 45 years of sobriety, sending an inspiring message to fans.
articles.content:
(CNN)Oscar-winning actor Anthony Hopkins has posted a Twitter video celebrating 45 years of sobriety, sending an uplifting message to fans.
